comments.message: Hi James, interesting post! Any chance you could find an image to go along with it? Images help grab attention and tell a story with higher impact. You should be able to use the Update Entry button on the right of your post and follow the instructions to add images from there. We know occasionally people have issues uploading images so let us know by hitting the Feedback button at the bottom of most pages of our site if you face any problems. Looking forward to seeing more of your inspiring insights on OpenIDEO. And here's some tips on adding visual goodness to your idea: http://ideo.pn/vis-uals plus more on evolving your thought-starter: http://ideo.pn/oi-evolve

summary: Back in the early 2000s, SARs outbreak which affected one of the most populous regions in the world with a global flight network reaching every corner of the Earth. SARs as oppose to Ebola was airborne and containment response had to be drastic. Here is a quick summary and link as to how and why was it so effective.
title: Containment lessons from SARS
